00020 #ifndef LV2_EVENT_HELPERS_H
00021 #define LV2_EVENT_HELPERS_H

00023 #include <assert.h>
00024 #include <stdbool.h>
00025 #include <stdint.h>
00026 #include <string.h>

00028 #include "lv2_event.h"
00029 
00043 static inline uint16_t
00044 lv2_event_pad_size(uint16_t size)
00045 {
00046         return (size + 7) & (~7);
00047 }
00048 
00049 
00053 static inline void
00054 lv2_event_buffer_reset(LV2_Event_Buffer* buf, uint16_t stamp_type, uint8_t *data)
00055 {
00056         buf->data = data;
00057         buf->header_size = sizeof(LV2_Event_Buffer);
00058         buf->stamp_type = stamp_type;
00059         buf->event_count = 0;
00060         buf->size = 0;
00061 }
00062 
00063 
00065 static inline LV2_Event_Buffer*
00066 lv2_event_buffer_new(uint32_t capacity, uint16_t stamp_type)
00067 {
00068         LV2_Event_Buffer* buf = (LV2_Event_Buffer*)malloc(sizeof(LV2_Event_Buffer) + capacity);
00069         if (buf != NULL) {
00070                 buf->capacity = capacity;
00071                 lv2_event_buffer_reset(buf, stamp_type, (uint8_t *)(buf + 1));
00072                 return buf;
00073         } else {
00074                 return NULL;
00075         }
00076 }
00077

00083 typedef struct {
00084         LV2_Event_Buffer* buf;
00085         uint32_t          offset;
00086 } LV2_Event_Iterator;
00087 
00088 
00091 static inline bool
00092 lv2_event_begin(LV2_Event_Iterator* iter,
00093                 LV2_Event_Buffer*   buf)
00094 {
00095         iter->buf = buf;
00096         iter->offset = 0;
00097         return (buf->size > 0);
00098 }
00099 
00100 
00103 static inline bool
00104 lv2_event_is_valid(LV2_Event_Iterator* iter)
00105 {
00106         return (iter->offset < iter->buf->size);
00107 }
00108 
00109 
00113 static inline bool
00114 lv2_event_increment(LV2_Event_Iterator* iter)
00115 {
00116         assert(lv2_event_is_valid(iter));
00117 
00118         LV2_Event* const ev = (LV2_Event*)(
00119                         (uint8_t*)iter->buf->data + iter->offset);
00120 
00121         iter->offset += lv2_event_pad_size(sizeof(LV2_Event) + ev->size);       
00122         
00123         return true;
00124 }
00125 
00126 
00134 static inline LV2_Event*
00135 lv2_event_get(LV2_Event_Iterator* iter,
00136               uint8_t**           data)
00137 {
00138         assert(lv2_event_is_valid(iter));
00139 
00140         LV2_Event* const ev = (LV2_Event*)(
00141                         (uint8_t*)iter->buf->data + iter->offset);
00142 
00143         if (data)
00144                 *data = (uint8_t*)ev + sizeof(LV2_Event);
00145 
00146         return ev;
00147 }
00148 
00149 
00153 static inline uint16_t
00154 lv2_event_get_nonpod_type(LV2_Event_Iterator* iter)
00155 {
00156         assert(lv2_event_is_valid(iter));
00157 
00158         LV2_Event* const ev = (LV2_Event*)(
00159                         (uint8_t*)iter->buf->data + iter->offset);
00160         
00161         if (ev->type != 0 || ev->size < 2)
00162           return 0;
00163         
00164         return *(uint16_t*)((uint8_t*)ev + sizeof(LV2_Event));
00165 }
00166 
00167 
00173 static inline bool
00174 lv2_event_write(LV2_Event_Iterator* iter,
00175                 uint32_t            frames,
00176                 uint32_t            subframes,
00177                 uint16_t            type,
00178                 uint16_t            size,
00179                 const uint8_t*      data)
00180 {
00181         if (iter->buf->capacity - iter->buf->size < sizeof(LV2_Event) + size)
00182                 return false;
00183 
00184         LV2_Event* const ev = (LV2_Event*)(
00185                         (uint8_t*)iter->buf->data + iter->offset);
00186         
00187         ev->frames = frames;
00188         ev->subframes = subframes;
00189         ev->type = type;
00190         ev->size = size;
00191         memcpy((uint8_t*)ev + sizeof(LV2_Event), data, size);
00192         ++iter->buf->event_count;
00193         
00194         size = lv2_event_pad_size(sizeof(LV2_Event) + size);
00195         iter->buf->size += size;
00196         iter->offset    += size;
00197         
00198         return true;
00199 }
00200 
00201 
00205 static inline uint8_t*
00206 lv2_event_reserve(LV2_Event_Iterator* iter,
00207                   uint32_t frames,
00208                   uint32_t subframes,
00209                   uint16_t type,
00210                   uint16_t size) 
00211 {
00212         size = lv2_event_pad_size(size);
00213         if (iter->buf->capacity - iter->buf->size < sizeof(LV2_Event) + size)
00214                 return NULL;
00215 
00216         LV2_Event* const ev = (LV2_Event*)((uint8_t*)iter->buf->data + 
00217                                            iter->offset);
00218         
00219         ev->frames = frames;
00220         ev->subframes = subframes;
00221         ev->type = type;
00222         ev->size = size;
00223         ++iter->buf->event_count;
00224         
00225         size = lv2_event_pad_size(sizeof(LV2_Event) + size);
00226         iter->buf->size += size;
00227         iter->offset    += size;
00228         
00229         return (uint8_t*)ev + sizeof(LV2_Event);
00230 }
00231 
00232 
00238 static inline bool
00239 lv2_event_write_event(LV2_Event_Iterator* iter,
00240                       const LV2_Event*    ev,
00241                       const uint8_t*      data)
00242 {
00243         if (iter->buf->capacity - iter->buf->size < sizeof(LV2_Event) + ev->size)
00244                 return false;
00245 
00246         LV2_Event* const write_ev = (LV2_Event*)(
00247                         (uint8_t*)iter->buf->data + iter->offset);
00248         
00249         *write_ev = *ev;
00250         memcpy((uint8_t*)write_ev + sizeof(LV2_Event), data, ev->size);
00251         ++iter->buf->event_count;
00252         
00253         const uint16_t size = lv2_event_pad_size(sizeof(LV2_Event) + ev->size);
00254         iter->buf->size += size;
00255         iter->offset    += size;
00256         
00257         return true;
00258 }
